vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to appoint a time, be fixed, be appointed
1a) (Pual)
1a1) to be fixed, be appointed
1a2) appointed times (participle)
Aramaic equivalent: ze.man (זְמַן "to agree" H2164)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 被指定, 被固定 (時間)
1a) (Pual) (分詞)
1a1) 被固定,被指定的時間
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 被指定, 被固定 (时间)
1a) (Pual) (分词)
1a1) 被固定,被指定的时间
